message:
SYSTEM: 2018.10.NII.pptx: Diapositiva {9}
Facts in the text:
The purchase is uttered via a contract.
A rescission is claimed, adducing the fact that one of the parts was a minor.
A fact of duress (threatening) on one of the parts is issued. The cause of the ending of the contract is expressed in the following sentence.
The former rescission is rescinded, what makes the contract valid again.
speaker: SYSTEM
